arts.ttl: David Moyes' comments speak volumes about improving Everton after draw at Wolves
arts.sum: Everton extended their unbeaten run in the Premier League to eight games but couldn't claim all three points against Wolves - not that David Moyes felt they deserved them

arts.ttl: Jarrad Branthwaite and Beto pay price as astonishing Everton point emerges
arts.sum: Analysis from Chris Beesley after the clash between Everton and Wolves in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Wolves go six clear of relegation zone as Everton extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: The in-form Toffees opened the scoring after 33 minutes as Harrison’s shot nestled in Jose Sa ’s bottom-left corner following a deflection off Matt Doherty, ending a run of 35 Premier League games without a goal for the winger. Everton extended their unbeaten run to eight Premier League matches in a frantic 1-1 draw with relegation-threatened Wolverhampton Wanderers, who went six points clear of the bottom three.

arts.ttl: Everton boss David Moyes admits Wolves were the better team during stalemate
arts.sum: Jack Harrison gave the visitors the lead in the first half before Marshall Munetsi opened his account for Wolves seven minutes later.

arts.ttl: Everton get the last laugh as broadcasters burned again and David Moyes luxury clear
arts.sum: The Joe Thomas verdict from Molineux as Everton extend their unbeaten Premier League run to eight matches with a 1-1 draw with Wolves

Bellegarde, impressive throughout the first-half, advanced the ball to the edge of the area and played a beautiful through ball into Munetsi’s path, who calmly stroked past Pickford to level the game again. The Spaniard went close with a free-kick just seven minutes after his introduction, but his effort from the right side on the edge of the penalty area could only find the side netting.

arts.ttl: David Moyes gets instant Everton reaction after pulling no punches in press conference
arts.sum: Snap report from Chris Beesley after the clash between Everton and Wolves in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Wolves edge further clear of Premier League relegation zone after Everton draw
arts.sum: Jack Harrison’s first goal since February 2024 opened the scoring for Everton before Marshall Munetsi levelled seven minutes later.

arts.ttl: Wolverhampton Wanderers 1-1 Everton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Andre stars, Premier League relegation battle heats up
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Everton.

arts.ttl: Everton player ratings as two get 8/10 and Carlos Alcaraz lively again in Wolves draw
arts.sum: Chris Beesley scores the Everton players after the 1-1 Premier League draw at Wolves
